extendedInfo.description: Arm yourself and charm your friends with the all new SOA app from the critically acclaimed TV series, Sons of Anarchy, created by Kurt Sutter.  Combining the best features from the legacy SOA app and the SOA Gear app featured in season 4; the all new SOA app is an immersive, interactive experience bringing never before seen content exploration, shop-able gear from the show, and introducing 'Perspective' - a feature rich, virtual view of the SOA clubhouse.  Explore on your own or sync with Broadcast season 5, or DVD/Blu-ray season 4 to shop the items you see on screen - New content is introduced as the season progresses- Use 'Perspective' to navigate the SOA clubhouse using your devices gyroscope or using swipe mode- Access to alternate scenes and 'appisodesâ- Explore character bio's and get rap-sheets of your favorite characters- Production Stills- Storyboards- Exclusive trivia from the upcoming board game- Factoids from the showPlease note, this app is optimized for 4.0TM and Â©2012 FX Networks, LLC. All Rights Reserved.

reviews.title: Unwanted picture files!
reviews.comment: What is the purpose of this app storing pictures in my gallery? 65 files, that\'s insane..until this is fixed, I am un-installing.
reviews.author: Christina Marie

reviews.title: Posts all pictures in my gallery
reviews.comment: Uninstalled cause it keeps throwing all pictures into my gallery..annoying..No thank you
reviews.author: Matt Sasges

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: All items are saved at pictures in your gallery... Fix
reviews.author: andrew barba

reviews.title: Nice app, cool is your a fan like me
reviews.comment: I don\'t get what all the people are complaining about. I didn\'t get any pics in my gallery and maybe if you did its from downloading then appisodes. What fussy people don\'t know/understand is android apps Arnt as easy to make as iPhone apps. Theres a huge range of different hardware and software of a even wider range of phones when it comes to the droid. You can\'t expect it to work 100% of the time on every different phone, it takes a lot of money to beta test on every phone available for droids. I love it!
reviews.author: Jimmy Skinner

reviews.title: It works!
reviews.comment: Today is the first time the app has worked all season!  Thank you for the update!  Digging into the bonus content now...  Dropping one star because bonus content is glitchy.  Screen shifts off to the left, cutting off some text.  And, not all scenes shown on the menu can be viewed.    Still, just thrilled to be able to view it at all.  Love this show!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update for Season 6?
reviews.comment: Been using this app since the first release on Android and iOS...Any word on if it will be updated to the new season starting tomorrow?   The little tidbits of information this app gives us is a great compliment to the show!  And those with the gallery issues, its not the app itself, its your gallery app. Hell mine even puts my Colbert Report pictures in my gallery. Its how your gallery scans for photos thats the problem!
reviews.author: A Google User
